ecoware.ecowareprocessor.kpi.calculators

Class StandardKPICalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecoware.ecowareprocessor.kpi.KPIManager
      • ecoware.ecowareprocessor.kpi.calculators.StandardKPICalculator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrivalRateCalculator, AvgRTCalculator, ReliabilityCalculator

    public abstract class StandardKPICalculator
extends KPIManager
    Author:
    Armando Varriale

    This is an abstract class that provide an implementation of a standard calculator KPI. It extends the KPIManager abstract class by adding some specific aspects (methods and properties) that characterize all calculator KPIs, but doesn't implement the "launch()" method (that will be implemented by specific subclasses).

    The aspects that have been introduced refer to the concept of "inspection interval" and "output production". The first is the window size used to collect data to process with Esper, while the second is the frequency by which the processed data are pulled out and sent to the application.
    The "inspection interval" is characterized by "interval unit" (eg. unit of time) and "interval value" (eg. a positive number); so if "interval unit" is "seconds" and "interval value" is "30" it means that the valuation window size is 30 seconds.

    The "output production" is characterized by "output unit" (eg. unit of time) and "output value" (eg. a positive number); so if "output unit" is "seconds" and "output value" is "5" it means that data are pulled out every 5 seconds.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getIntervalUnit()
      Returns the interval unit used in the Esper query.
      int getIntervalValue()
      Returns the interval value used in the Esper query.
      String getOutputUnit()
      Returns the output unit used in the Esper query (eg. how often data are retrieved).
      int getOutputValue()
      Returns the output value used in the Esper query (eg. how often data are retrieved).

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardKPICalculator

        public StandardKPICalculator(Element xmlElement,
                     String busServer,
                     com.espertech.esper.client.Configuration esperConfiguration)
        Constructs a new StandardKPICalculator using the specified XML element. The bus server name (that is the hostname on which the bus server is running) and Esper configuration are also required.
        Parameters:
        xmlElement - the XML element (node) of the configuration file from which retrieve the information to build the KPI object
        busServer - the hostname on which the bus server is running
        esperConfiguration - the Esper current configuration (that is an Configuration object. For further detail see the Esper documentation).
